Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Although feedback from AI is faster and more convenient, it does not overshadow the feedback from teachers, who will better understand the context of your questions and ensure they are providing the most appropriate information.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: The only difference I can think of is that asking AI is easier (and less intimidating) when dealing with less approachable teachers, or when the question feels "obvious."
